definition: to beat easily/to gain an easy victory

sentences.english: Argentina ran away with the World Cup a few years ago.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷幾年前輕取世界盃足球賽的冠軍。

sentences.english: The English team coasted comfortably to a six stroke victory.
sentences.chinese: 英國隊以六分之差輕取對手。

sentences.english: The Oxford crew walked away from Cambridge.
He carried off champion easily in the competition.
